Just don't act like a bunch of 'cons if he does get kicked out.  I would 
uncortable in a 'jettison some weight' scenario.  Speaking of which, how do 
you get rid of chars who's player has been kicked out?  Do you have other 
people play them, or do you agree with the owners of the chars on how to get 
rid of them?  Or do you just pretend they never existed?  HEEELP
